description: Detects usage of the copy builtin cmd command to copy files with the ".dmp"/".dump" extension from a remote share
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Copy .DMP/.DUMP Files From Remote Share Via Cmd.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Cmd.Exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*copy\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \\\\*" AND process.command_line.text:("*.dmp*" OR "*.dump*")))
